Backend

Class ActionTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Backend.Tile
      • Backend.ActionTile

  • public class ActionTile
extends Tile
    ActionTile class that represents all the action tiles in the Game. It stores the type of the action tile.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yan Yan Ji

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(Board board,
                    Player player,
                    int col,
                    int row)
        Method that will execute certain action according to the type of the action tile.
        Parameters:
        board - Current board where the tile is in the game.
        player - Chosen player from the game.
        col - Chosen index of the column on the board.
        row - Chosen index of the row on the board.

      • fire

        private void fire(Board board,
                  int col,
                  int row)
        Method that will put square 3x3 on fire on the board.
        Parameters:
        board - Current board of the game.
        col - Index of the column on the board that is center of the chosen square.
        row - Index of the row on the board that is center of the chosen square.

      • ice

        private void ice(Board board,
                 int col,
                 int row)
        Method that will freeze square 3x3 or smaller on the board.
        Parameters:
        board - Current board of the game.
        col - Index of the column on the board that is center of the chosen square.
        row - Index of the row on the board that is center of the chosen square.

      • doubleMove

        private void doubleMove(Board board,
                        Player player,
                        int col,
                        int row)
        Method that will give the chosen player an extra move.
        Parameters:
        board - Current board of the game.
        player - Player who has a turn.
        col - Index of column on the board of the next move.
        row - Index of row on the board of the next move.

      • backTrackMove

        private void backTrackMove(Board board,
                           int col,
                           int row)
        Method that will put a player on the position on the board from the last second turn. If the last second position is on fire it will check if the last third position, otherwise will do nothing.
        Parameters:
        board - Current board of the game.
        col - Index of the column of the chosen player.
        row - Index of the row of the chosen player.

      • setSquare

        private int[] setSquare(Board board,
                        int col,
                        int row)
        It will set square on the board.
        Parameters:
        board - Current board of the game.
        col - Index of the column on the board with the center of the square.
        row - Index of the row on the board with the center of the square.
        Returns:
        Coordinates of the corner point of the square.
